title: Assemblies for construction sites (ACS) switchboard construction
fullText:
ACS switchboards shall comply with AS/NZS 3439.4 or AS/NZS 61439.4 and the additional requirements of Appendix I.
NOTE: Switchboards complying with AS/NZS 3439.4 or AS/NZS 61439.4 are deemed to comply with Clause 2.3.2.1 Items (a), (b) and (c).
